casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Lee NEAL No. 102P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Christopher Lee Neal, For Neal, Christopher Lee. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, H. Sean Boone, Assistant District Attorney, Jocelyn C. Wright, Attorney at Law, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 26th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Alamance County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
